title: It has come to my attention that you new Boards folks have not realized the Legend of DFGaren
body:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=944179&d=1397516479

REST IN PEACE DFGAREN I KNEW YOU WELL

I am proud to say I have achieved Platinum this season by playing exclusively DFG rush Garen in ranked. 

Video I made: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3m-2LdW_S2M

I'd love it if you shared the video.

My old GD AMA thread: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4351838&highlight=

Here's my guide: http://www.solomid.net/guide/view/126389-garen-build-guide-fighter-by-ouroboro

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=963726&d=1399856404

Have fun.

I might start streaming soon. Would you guys watch it?

I was a weak, lonely Garen. I couldn't even kill an ADC. But with a little help from the words of Ouroboro, I'm now able to kill anyone, anytime! It even works on TANKS! Call now for a free trial at (DFG) DEM-ACIA.

Brb getting this number
The prophet has spoken!

With the might of Demacia,I must obtain the power of DFGaren.
I'm sure I will face many nay-sayers,but this power interest me too much to ignore it.

> With the might of Demacia,I must obtain the power of DFGaren.
> I'm sure I will face many nay-sayers,but this power interest me too much to ignore it.

Good luck. It takes time to control the power of the DFG. You can do it.

I convinced a friend to join the ranks of DFGaren. He lost lane hard, but exploded people nonetheless with his DFG + Ult combo. The enemy top laner said in all "ok, now I get it why you built DFG" after being deleted by the same Garen he was stomping earlier.

> I convinced a friend to join the ranks of DFGaren. He lost lane hard, but exploded people nonetheless with his DFG + Ult combo. The enemy top laner said in all "ok, now I get it why you built DFG" after being deleted by the same Garen he was stomping earlier.

My personal blessings to him.
Well, that's what DFG stands for right? Die For Garen?

and just like that

the legend is dead.
I would watch your stream XD
I might start streaming soon. Would you guys watch it?

It'd be great if you guys shared the video.

Spread the word of DFGaren.

It's impressive that you got plat playing only DFG garen. Seriously though, I understand the point of DFG, but is there really not a better item for him? Literally every point of AP is wasted. It seems like rushing a cleaver is going to add a lot more holistic damage to your kit than DFG.  Is it just the surprise factor of nuking someone from 1/3 health with your ult?

> It's impressive that you got plat playing only DFG garen. Seriously though, I understand the point of DFG, but is there really not a better item for him? Literally every point of AP is wasted. It seems like rushing a cleaver is going to add a lot more holistic damage to your kit than DFG.  Is it just the surprise factor of nuking someone from 1/3 health with your ult?

This is a very common argument against DFGaren. It is true the AP is wasted, but look beyond that and realize just how powerful the active is by itself. At first glance, it's quite strong, but not enough to warrant 3.1k gold.

However Garen's ultimate scales very strangely, having a large base damage as well as missing health scaling. The missing health scaling scales with the % amplification as well. I supplied the math on my guide, won't go over it here because lolphone.

You're looking at 1.5k magic damage to a standard ADC not counting MR. That's a LOT for two buttons that are single targeted spells AT A RANGE COMING FROM AN BRUISER/TANK LIKE GAREN. (Level 16 ultimate)

Against tanks? You can delete tanks who dive into YOUR ADC, making GAREN an excellent tank killer as well.

The AP is wasted, but the gold is not. DFGaren shines late game, where normal Garens flop. It's not just for the surprise factor. IT'S ACTUALLY USEFUL.

> > It's impressive that you got plat playing only DFG garen. Seriously though, I understand the point of DFG, but is there really not a better item for him? Literally every point of AP is wasted. It seems like rushing a cleaver is going to add a lot more holistic damage to your kit than DFG.  Is it just the surprise factor of nuking someone from 1/3 health with your ult?
> 
> This is a very common argument against DFGaren. It is true the AP is wasted, but look beyond that and realize just how powerful the active is by itself. At first glance, it's quite strong, but not enough to warrant 3.1k gold.
> 
> However Garen's ultimate scales very strangely, having a large base damage as well as missing health scaling. The missing health scaling scales with the % amplification as well. I supplied the math on my guide, won't go over it here because lolphone.
> 
> You're looking at 1.5k magic damage to a standard ADC not counting MR. That's a LOT for two buttons that are single targeted spells AT A RANGE COMING FROM AN BRUISER/TANK LIKE GAREN. (Level 16 ultimate)
> 
> Against tanks? You can delete tanks who dive into YOUR ADC, making GAREN an excellent tank killer as well.
> 
> The AP is wasted, but the gold is not. DFGaren shines late game, where normal Garens flop. It's not just for the surprise factor. IT'S ACTUALLY USEFUL.

Still, why not Statikk Shiv + DFG?

> > > It's impressive that you got plat playing only DFG garen. Seriously though, I understand the point of DFG, but is there really not a better item for him? Literally every point of AP is wasted. It seems like rushing a cleaver is going to add a lot more holistic damage to your kit than DFG.  Is it just the surprise factor of nuking someone from 1/3 health with your ult?
> > 
> > This is a very common argument against DFGaren. It is true the AP is wasted, but look beyond that and realize just how powerful the active is by itself. At first glance, it's quite strong, but not enough to warrant 3.1k gold.
> > 
> > However Garen's ultimate scales very strangely, having a large base damage as well as missing health scaling. The missing health scaling scales with the % amplification as well. I supplied the math on my guide, won't go over it here because lolphone.
> > 
> > You're looking at 1.5k magic damage to a standard ADC not counting MR. That's a LOT for two buttons that are single targeted spells AT A RANGE COMING FROM AN BRUISER/TANK LIKE GAREN. (Level 16 ultimate)
> > 
> > Against tanks? You can delete tanks who dive into YOUR ADC, making GAREN an excellent tank killer as well.
> > 
> > The AP is wasted, but the gold is not. DFGaren shines late game, where normal Garens flop. It's not just for the surprise factor. IT'S ACTUALLY USEFUL.
> 
> Still, why not Statikk Shiv + DFG?

Stattik Shiv doesn't give the damage Black Cleaver and I Edge does. Garen doesn't need attack speed. The crit doesn't hurt, but AD is much more valuable because it boosts the damage of his two other damaging skills.

Black Cleaver+DFG+I Edge gives DFG Garen the maximum damage output while being able to take in two tank items.

Here's an alternative build if you're feeling ballsy however:

Black Cleaver, DFG, Infinity Edge, Stattik Shiv, Trinity Force, Sorc Shoes. Maximum damage. You are glass, and they are waiting to be smashed.
don't forget DFG gives cooldown reduction
